title: Social Learning Competency Enhancement Program via E-Mentoring

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A process where in-service elementary educators collaborate with peer learners via an e-mentoring platform to accumulate social learning experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can expand their peer network by over 30% through e-mentoring in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can improve job performance confidence by over 25% through social learning activities.
Learners can enhance problem-solving efficiency in educational settings by 15% based on online mentoring feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
